name: rock-incense
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Rock moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Rock-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Breeding: Sudowoodo begets a Bonsly Egg.

flavor_text.black_white: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Rock-type moves.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Rock-type moves.
